MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPropertyChanged(string propertyName) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsPropertyChanged (propertyName As String) As Boolean

span.span: The name of the property.

summary.span: 使用 DetectChanges 确定物产的当前值与给定名称是否与它的初始值不同。

span.span: Uses DetectChanges to determine whether or not the current value of the property with the given name is different from its original value.

summary.span: 注意这可能不同于虽然属性没有更改仍然能被标记为修改的标记为修改的属性。

span.span: Note that this may be different from the property being marked as modified since a property which has not changed can still be marked as modified.

returns.span: 如果用户已更改了属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于复杂属性，复杂对象的新实例（该实例与原始实例具有相同的属性值）不会被此方法视为不同。For complex properties, a new instance of the complex object which has all the same property values as the original instance is not considered to be different by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RejectPropertyChanges(string propertyName) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub RejectPropertyChanges (propertyName As String)

span.span: The name of the property to change.

summary.span: 拒绝对给定名称属性所做的任何更改，因为属性最近接受加载、附加、保存或更改。

span.span: Rejects any changes made to the property with the given name since the property was last loaded, attached, saved, or changes were accepted.

summary.span: 存储属性的初始值，且不再将属性标记为已修改。

span.span: The original value of the property is stored and the property will no longer be marked as modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果结果是，不会将实体的属性标记为 "已修改"，则会将该实体标记为 "未更改"。If the result is that no properties of the entity are marked as modified, then the entity will be marked as Unchanged. 对于处于已修改或未更改状态的实体，只能拒绝对属性的更改。Changes to properties can only rejected for entities that are in the Modified or Unchanged state. 对其他状态下的实体调用此方法 (添加、删除或分离) 将导致引发异常。Calling this method for entities in other states (Added, Deleted, or Detached) will result in an exception being thrown. 拒绝更改的实体属性的更改或修改的未更改属性不会有任何操作。Rejecting changes to properties of an Unchanged entity or unchanged properties of a Modified is a no-op.
